content.heading: noshare
content.subhead: Chrome extension that hides intrusive sharing widgets on Bloomberg, CNN, The Huffington Post, Lifehacker, Mashable, Medium, The Verge, Vox, The Wall Street Journal, and The Washington Post!

children.text: noshare: Chrome extension that hides intrusive sharing widgets on Bloomberg, CNN, The Huffington Post, Lifehacker, Mashable, Medium, The Verge, Vox, The Wall Street Journal, and The Washington Post!

content.html:
Chrome extension that hides sharing widgets on: Bloomberg, CNN, The Huffington Post, Lifehacker, Mashable, Medium, The Verge, Vox, The Wall Street Journal, and The Washington Post! Want to block annoying sharing widgets on another site?! Open an issue and we'll do our best to accommodate :)

Contributing

All contributions welcome!
